name: Morning Sun
description: A ray of sunlight shines upon you, basking you in healing light. The user gains 2d12 + MOVE hit points. If this move is activated at night, halve the total healing.
higherLevels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Effectiveness varies depending on when it is used.
